Package edu.cmu.cs.prt

Class PrtSchedule

java.lang.Object
edu.cmu.cs.prt.PrtSchedule
public final class PrtSchedule extends Object
A static utility class that contains methods to get information related to the scheduled arrival of vehicles at stops.

For example, get all arrival times at the CMU bus stop for 61D, heading inbound, after 6:00pm today: 

 Route route = PrtInfo.routeOf("61D").get();
 // Get scheduled trips for 61D with customizations mentioned above
 List<ScheduledTrip> trips = new PrtSchedule.Selector().forRoute(route)
                                                   .onDate(LocalDate.now())
                                                   .inDirection(RouteDirection.INBOUND)
                                                   .after(LocalTime.of(18, 0))
                                                   .trips();
 // Get the CMU bus stop (FORBES AVE + MOREWOOD AVE)
 Stop stop = PrtInfo.closestStop(new Location(40.443418243876266, -79.94288909575457));
 List<LocalTime> arrivalTimes = PrtSchedule.arrivalTimesFor(trips, stop);

    • arrivalTimesFor

      public static List<LocalTime> arrivalTimesFor(Collection<ScheduledTrip> trips, Stop stop)
      Returns a list of all arrival times of input trips at given stop. Returned list will be sorted from the earliest to the latest arrival time.

      If the input trips is empty, or if none of the input trips pass through the input stop, an empty list will be returned.

      Parameters:
      trips - Scheduled trips to search through
      stop - Stop to search for
      Returns:
      List of arrival times for input route at stop
